name: Invalid An Active Admin creates and grades a new assignment

steps.name: Given  User sets Authorization to No Auth
Given  User sets a POST Request to valid base URL and invalid end point
When  User create a POST request to create assignment and grade assignment by an active Admin from "POSTAssignment" and 13
Then  The response status code should be "404"
